channel.title: The ADAM platform on Expert Analytics
channel.description: Recent content in The ADAM platform on Expert Analytics

item.title: Diako Darian
item.description: Diako holds a Ph.D. in Computational Mathematics from the University of Oslo. As a student at both Mathematics and Physics departments at the University of Oslo, he has acquired a broad knowledge in various physical and mathematical theories, and numerical methods.

item.title: Roar Emaus
item.description: Roar has a master’s degree in High Energy Physics from the University of Oslo, completed in 2018. In his thesis he studied two different models of particle production at high energies, one statistical using the thermodynamical equations and one using the properties of a theoretical particle called Pomeron.

item.title: Ola Skavhaug
item.description: Founder and CEO of Expert Analytics. Loves mixing high and low-level languages to combine flexibility with performance.
